- (NSString *) healthStatus [read, write, retain]

The health status of this instance.

"Healthy" means that the instance is healthy and should remain in service. "Unhealthy" means that the instance is unhealthy. Auto Scaling should terminate and replace it.

Constraints:
Length: 1 - 32
Pattern: [---
]*
